thread.title: Tamil Nadu crisis Live: Jayalalithaa’s niece Deepa Jayakumar launches ‘MGR-Amma-Deepa’ political front
thread.title_full: Tamil Nadu crisis Live: Jayalalithaa’s niece Deepa Jayakumar launches ‘MGR-Amma-Deepa’ political front

author: FE Online
title: Tamil Nadu crisis Live: Jayalalithaa’s niece Deepa Jayakumar launches ‘MGR-Amma-Deepa’ political front
text:
Tamil Nadu crisis Live: Jayalalithaa’s niece Deepa Jayakumar launches ‘MGR-Amma-Deepa’ political front Tamil Nadu crisis Live: Jayalalithaa’s niece Deepa Jayakumar launches ‘MGR-Amma-Deepa’ political front Jayalalithaa's niece Deepa Jayakumar launches MGR-Amma-Deepa political front. By: FE Online | New Delhi | Updated: February 24, 2017 6:19 PM Deepa Jayakumar (ANI) 
Jayalalithaa’s niece Deepa Jayakumar launches MGR-Amma-Deepa political front. Speaking to reporters she said she won’t let down people. Here are her quotes: 
*There is a traitor group working behind the govt and we will work continuously to throw away this group: Deepa Jayakumar 
*’Amma Deepa Peravai’ is the platform we launch formally today: Deepa Jayakumar, #Jayalalithaa niece 
* It’s a federation at this moment and I urge youth to support: Deepa Jayakumar when asked ‘is her new platform a political party?’
